author: Lydia Smith
title: Self-Isolating 97-Year-Old Veteran Plays Harmonica to Wife Through Glass Door
description: Lou serenaded his wife Jackie while they were separated because of social distancing. They have been married for 38 years and reside at the Soldiers' and Sailors' Home in Erie.
content:
A World War Two veteran separated from his wife at a nursing home because of social distancing has found a way to express his love, playing her a song on his harmonica through a glass door.
The 97-year-old, Lou, serenaded his wife Jackie at the home in Penns… [+4816 chars]
